errors.notFound: The page you are looking for does not exist.

delete.aria: Delete item (Shift + Click to delete without confirmation)

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.discordPrecachingDesc: * Discord precaching sends the Flowinity link of any media attachment to a Discord channel that gets cleared every 10 minutes in order to have the image cached by Discord by the time it's sent by yourself. Do not enable this if you don't trust Discord.

myAccount.title: My Flowinity
myAccount.emailSet: Your email is currently set to {email}.

totp.disabled: Give your account an extra layer of security by enabling 2FA.
totp.enableText:
If you'd like to enable it, you may do so here. You will need to scan the QR code or enter the secret in your desired 2FA application such as Authy or Bitwarden (recommended) and enter the code generated by the application.
2FA is a great way to add additional security to your Flowinity account, please note that if you lose access to the 2FA application, you won't be able to login.
totp.disableText: If you'd like to disable 2FA, you may do so here, your account will be more unsafe if you keep 2FA disabled, please ensure your password is secure.
totp.scan: Please scan the QR code or enter the secret into your desired 2FA application.
totp.cantScan: Can't scan the QR code? Enter the code.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.insightsDesc: * Words in screenshots and top chats are always hidden.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description:
If you'd like to delete your account, you may do so here. Please note that this action is irreversible after the 14 day wait period, and will delete the following:

- Gallery items (including the direct links to your uploads, links will be deactivated immediately after the deletion request, without the 14 day wait, however reactivating your account will reactivate the links)
- Messages from Communications will be anonymised, not deleted.
- Workspace documents
- Collections
- Insights data
- All other data associated with your account

You will be able to reactivate your account within 14 days of the deletion request, after this time, your account will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and will delete all of your data.
deleteAccount.purgeText: Purging the gallery will delete all of your uploads immediately, without the 14 day wait period. This action is irreversible and will delete all of your uploads.

domains.title: Available Domains
domains.disclaimer: If you'd like your domain added, email troplo{'@'}troplo.com, ensure your domain has already been registered and configured with a DNS provider.

step0.description: Welcome to your new Flowinity instance! The open file sharing and social suite.
step0.subtitle: This wizard will guide you through the initial setup process such as setting up the database, and registering an account.

step1.title: Database Setup
step1.subtitle:
Please enter your MariaDB database credentials below.
WARNING: THIS WILL ATTEMPT TO MODIFY THE DATABASE SCHEMA, PLEASE ENSURE YOU HAVE A BACKUP BEFORE CONTINUING.
step1.testError: Connection failed, please check your credentials and try again.

step2.title: Admin Account
step2.subtitle: Please enter your admin account details below.

step3.title: Instance Configuration
step3.subtitle: Please enter your instance configuration below.
step3.name: Instance Name
step3.multiThreaded: Max thread utilisation (0 for all threads, recommended)

step4.title: Features
step4.subtitle: Please select the features you'd like to enable on your Flowinity.

autoCollects.title: AutoCollects
autoCollects.description: Automatically add uploaded items by rules into Flowinity Collections.
